name: p2plib
desc: Core library for building peer-to-peer applications.

name: AddressProperties
desc: Represents properties associated with a network address.

name: AddressProperties
desc: Creates a new instance of AddressProperties.

name: combine
desc: Combines the properties of this instance with another AddressProperties instance.

name: isLocal
desc: Indicates whether the address is local to the current node.

name: isNotLocal
desc: Returns true if the address is not local to the current node.

name: isNotStatic
desc: Returns true if the address is not static, meaning it can be considered stale.

name: isStatic
desc: Indicates whether the address is static and should not be considered stale.

name: lastSeen
desc: The timestamp (in milliseconds since epoch) when the address was last seen.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of the AddressProperties instance.

name: updateLastSeen
desc: Updates the lastSeen timestamp to the current time.

name: Crypto
desc: Provides cryptographic functionalities for encrypting, decrypting, signing, and verifying data.

name: Crypto
desc: Initializes a new instance of the Crypto class.

name: init
desc: Initializes the cryptographic engine and generates key pairs.

name: seal
desc: Encrypts a message's payload and signs the entire datagram.

name: unseal
desc: Decrypts and verifies the authenticity of a sealed datagram.

name: verify
desc: Verifies the digital signature of a datagram.

name: ExceptionBase
desc: Base class for all exceptions thrown by this library.

name: ExceptionBase
desc: Creates a new ExceptionBase instance.

name: message
desc: An optional message describing the exception.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of the exception.

name: ExceptionInvalidSignature
desc: Exception indicating that an invalid signature was detected.

name: ExceptionInvalidSignature
desc: Creates a new ExceptionInvalidSignature instance.

name: ExceptionInvalidTimestamp
desc: Exception indicating that an invalid timestamp was detected.

name: ExceptionInvalidTimestamp
desc: Creates a new ExceptionInvalidTimestamp instance.

name: ExceptionIsNotRunning
desc:
Exception indicating that an operation was attempted on a router that is not
currently running.

name: ExceptionIsNotRunning
desc: Creates a new ExceptionIsNotRunning instance.

name: ExceptionTransport
desc: Exception indicating an error related to the transport layer.

name: ExceptionTransport
desc: Creates a new ExceptionTransport instance.

name: ExceptionUnknownRoute
desc: Exception indicating that an unknown route was encountered.

name: ExceptionUnknownRoute
desc: Creates a new ExceptionUnknownRoute instance.

name: FullAddress
desc: Represents a full network address, including an IP address and a port number.

name: operator ==
desc: Determines whether this address is equal to another object.

name: FullAddress
desc: Creates a new FullAddress instance.

name: address
desc: The IP address of this network address.

name: hashCode
desc: Returns the hash code for this address.

name: isEmpty
desc: Returns true if the address is empty, meaning it has no IP address.

name: port
desc: The port number of this network address.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this address.

name: type
desc: Returns the type of IP address.

name: InitRequest
desc: Represents a request to initialize the cryptographic engine.

name: InitResponse
desc: Represents a response to an initialization request.

name: InitResult
desc: Represents the result of the initialization process.

name: Message
desc: Represents a network message.

name: Message
desc: Creates a new Message instance.

name: dstPeerId
desc: The destination Peer ID of the message.

name: emptySignedMessageLength
desc: Length of an empty signed message in bytes.

name: getDstPeerId
desc: Extracts the destination Peer ID from the datagram.

name: getHeader
desc: Extracts the header from the datagram.

name: getPayload
desc: Extracts the payload from the datagram.

name: getSignature
desc: Extracts the signature from a signed datagram.

name: getSrcPeerId
desc: Extracts the source Peer ID from the datagram.

name: getUnsignedDatagram
desc: Extracts the unsigned datagram from a signed datagram.

name: getUnsignedPayload
desc: Extracts the unsigned payload from a signed datagram.

name: hasCorrectLength
desc: Checks if the datagram has the correct length for a message.

name: hasEmptyPayload
desc: Checks if the signed datagram has an empty payload.

name: header
desc: The header of the message.

name: headerLength
desc: Length of the message header in bytes.

name: isEmpty
desc: Checks if the message has an empty payload.

name: isNotEmpty
desc: Checks if the message has a non-empty payload.

name: isNotEmptyPayload
desc: Checks if the datagram has a non-empty payload.

name: payload
desc: The payload of the message.

name: protocolNumber
desc: Protocol number for this message type.

name: srcPeerId
desc: The source Peer ID of the message.

name: toBytes
desc: Converts the message to a byte array.

name: Packet
desc: Represents a network packet.

name: Packet
desc: Creates a new Packet instance.

name: datagram
desc: The raw datagram data of the packet.

name: dstPeerId
desc: The destination Peer ID.

name: header
desc: The header of the packet.

name: payload
desc: The encrypted payload of the packet.

name: srcFullAddress
desc: The full network address of the source peer.

name: srcPeerId
desc: The source Peer ID.

name: PacketHeader
desc: Structure of a packet header:

name: operator ==
desc:
Overrides the == operator to compare two PacketHeader instances for
equality.

name: PacketHeader
desc: Creates a new PacketHeader instance.

name: copyWith
desc: Creates a copy of the PacketHeader with optional modifications.

name: forwardsCount
desc: The number of times the packet has been forwarded.

name: PacketHeader.fromBytes
desc: Creates a PacketHeader instance from a byte array.

name: hashCode
desc:
Overrides the hashCode method to generate a hash code based on the
runtimeType, issuedAt, and id of the PacketHeader.

name: id
desc: The unique identifier of the packet.

name: issuedAt
desc: The timestamp when the packet was issued (Unix timestamp with milliseconds).

name: length
desc: The total length of the header in bytes.

name: messageType
desc: The type of the packet.

name: setForwardsCount
desc: Sets the forwards count in the datagram.

name: toBytes
desc: Converts the PacketHeader to a byte array.

name: PacketType
desc: Represents the type of packet.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: PeerId
desc: Represents a Peer ID, which is used to uniquely identify a peer in the network.

name: PeerId
desc: Creates a new Peer ID from a byte array.

name: encPublicKey
desc: Returns the encryption public key of the peer.

name: PeerId.fromKeys
desc: Creates a new Peer ID from two keys: an encryption key and a signing key.

name: length
desc:
The total length of the Peer ID in bytes.
This is a constant value of 64 bytes (2 * _keyLength).

name: signPiblicKey
desc: Returns the signing public key of the peer.

name: PeerStatus
desc: Type definition for representing the status of a peer.

name: Route
desc: Represents a route to a peer in the network.

name: Route
desc: Creates a new Route instance.

name: addAddress
desc: Adds an address to the route.

name: addHeader
desc: Adds a header to the route's header history.

name: addresses
desc: The addresses associated with the peer.

name: canForward
desc: Whether the peer can forward messages to other peers.

name: getActualAddresses
desc: Returns the actual addresses for the route, filtering out stale addresses.

name: isEmpty
desc: Whether the route is empty (has no addresses).

name: isNotEmpty
desc: Whether the route is not empty (has at least one address).

name: lastHeaders
desc: The last headers received from the peer.

name: lastSeen
desc: The last time the peer was seen (in milliseconds since epoch).

name: maxStoredHeaders
desc: The maximum number of headers to store for the route.

name: peerId
desc: The unique identifier of the peer associated with this route.

name: removeStaleAddresses
desc: Removes stale addresses from the route.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of the route.

name: RouterBase
desc: Abstract base class for network routers.

name: RouterBase
desc: Creates a new RouterBase instance.

name: crypto
desc: The cryptography instance used for encryption and signing.

name: init
desc: Initializes the router.

name: isNotRun
desc: Whether the router is not currently running.

name: isRun
desc: Whether the router is currently running.

name: keepalivePeriod
desc:
The keepalive period, specifying the interval for sending keepalive
messages to peers.

name: logger
desc: The logger used for logging events.

name: maxStoredHeaders
desc: The maximum number of stored headers for routes.

name: messageTTL
desc:
The message time-to-live, specifying how long messages are considered
valid.

name: onMessage
desc: Handles incoming messages.

name: peerAddressTTL
desc:
The peer address time-to-live, specifying how long peer addresses are
considered valid. Defaults to twice the keepalive period.

name: resolvePeerId
desc: Resolves a Peer ID to a set of network addresses.

name: routes
desc:
The routes maintained by the router, stored as a map of PeerId to
Route.

name: selfId
desc: The self ID of the router.

name: sendDatagram
desc: Sends a datagram to the specified addresses.

name: start
desc: Starts the router.

name: stop
desc: Stops the router.

name: transports
desc: The transports used for network communication.

name: useForwardersLimit
desc: Defines the maximum number of forwarders to use for message delivery.

name: RouterL0
desc: Basic router implementation for relaying and forwarding datagrams.

name: RouterL0
desc: Creates a new RouterL0 instance.

name: deltaT
desc:
Defines the required clock synchronization accuracy between nodes, in
milliseconds.

name: maxForwardsLimit
desc: Defines the maximum number of times a message can be forwarded.

name: onMessage
desc: Handles incoming messages.

name: RouterL1
desc: Enhanced router with confirmation and keepalive features.

name: RouterL1
desc: Creates a new RouterL1 instance.

name: messageStream
desc: Returns a stream of incoming messages.

name: onMessage
desc: Handles incoming messages.

name: retryPeriod
desc: The retry period for sending messages.

name: selfAddresses
desc: Returns an iterable of the self addresses of this router.

name: sendDatagramConfirmable
desc: Sends a confirmable datagram and waits for an acknowledgement.

name: sendMessage
desc: Sends a message to the specified destination peer.

name: start
desc: Starts the router.

name: stop
desc: Stops the router.

name: RouterL2
desc: Enhanced router with more high-level API for building rich client applications.

name: RouterL2
desc: Creates a new instance of the RouterL2 class.

name: addPeerAddress
desc: Adds an address for a peer to the routing table.

name: getPeerStatus
desc: Returns the status of a peer.

name: lastSeenStream
desc: A stream of peer status updates.

name: onMessage
desc: Handles incoming packets.

name: peerOnlineTimeout
desc: The timeout period for considering a peer offline.

name: pingPeer
desc: Pings a peer to check if it is online.

name: removePeerAddress
desc: Removes the peer address from the routing table.

name: RouterL3
desc: Router implementation for Layer 3 (Network Layer).

name: RouterL3
desc: Creates a new RouterL3 instance.

name: addBootstrap
desc: Adds a bootstrap node to the router.

name: removeAllBootstraps
desc: Removes all bootstrap nodes from the router.

name: start
desc: Starts the router and binds to available network interfaces.

name: stop
desc: Stops the router and clears the transports.

name: StopProcessing
desc: Exception indicating that processing should be stopped immediately.

name: StopProcessing
desc: Creates a new StopProcessing instance.

name: TaskError
desc: Represents an error that occurred during a cryptographic task.

name: TaskRequest
desc: Represents a request for a cryptographic task.

name: TaskResult
desc: Represents the result of a cryptographic task.

name: TaskType
desc: Defines the different types of cryptographic tasks that can be performed.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Token
desc: Represents an immutable token.

name: operator ==
desc: Overrides the == operator to compare two tokens for equality.

name: Token
desc: Creates a new Token with the given value.

name: hashCode
desc:
Overrides the hashCode method to generate a hash code based on the
token's value.

name: toString
desc:
Overrides the toString method to return a base64Url-encoded
representation of the token's value.

name: value
desc: The value of the token, represented as a Uint8List.

name: TransportBase
desc: Base class for all transport implementations.

name: TransportBase
desc: Creates a new TransportBase instance.

name: bindAddress
desc: The address to bind to for receiving incoming messages.

name: logger
desc: A function for logging messages related to transport operations.

name: onMessage
desc: The callback function to invoke when a message is received.

name: send
desc: Sends a datagram to one or more addresses.

name: start
desc: Starts the transport.

name: stop
desc: Stops the transport.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of the bind address.

name: ttl
desc: The time-to-live for outgoing packets.

name: TransportUdp
desc: A UDP transport implementation.

name: TransportUdp
desc: Creates a new TransportUdp instance.

name: defaultPort
desc: The default port to use for UDP communication.

name: send
desc: Sends a datagram to the specified addresses.

name: start
desc: Starts the transport.

name: stop
desc: Stops the transport.

name: emptyUint8List
desc: An empty Uint8List for convenience and to avoid unnecessary allocations.

name: genRandomInt
desc: Generates a random integer using a cryptographically secure random number generator.

name: getRandomBytes
desc: Generates a list of random bytes of the specified length.

name: sealLength
desc: The length of the sealed data, in bytes.

name: signatureLength
desc: The length of the digital signature used for message authentication, in bytes.
